1633.text: That's the company that makes it, not just unmarried men.

1638.text: Unmarried men who rely on Cup-A-Soup for their whole diet say

1642.text: "it's actually, there's no additives, I, it's, it's bloody healthy actually..."

1647.text: "Knocks back the loneliness if you put whiskey in it"
